tool_description: Validate email addresses in real-time. Make sure a mailbox really exist. So you can avoid fake/invalid users on your database.
name: S Email Validator
title: S Email Validator

api_list.name: EmailValidator
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://s-email-validator1.p.rapidapi.com/emailValidator"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "s-email-validator1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
